# Change log

All notable changes to this project will be documented in this file.

## Unreleased

## v1.1.1

Bug fix for the version number in appendix. After upload to pypi, the setup
version number can't be read from main module. Move it out to a separate file.

## v1.1.0

Improve appendix for metrics and analysis. Including current version number,
is_new flag and language token. Change is backward compatible with existing
language token appendix.

## v1.0.1

Minor improvements on paramConfig

## V1.0.0

- Initial supports `fbc` and `fbp` for Conversion API(CAPI) events.
